info.title: Crypto News Feed API
info.description: This API provides access to cryptocurrency news articles, including functionality to fetch, parse, and store articles from various RSS feeds. It's built using Express and integrates with Prisma for database operations.

tags.name: Feeds
tags.description: Endpoints for fetching, parsing, and storing RSS feeds.

tags.name: Cryptocurrencies
tags.description: Endpoints for fetching, parsing, and storing cryptocurrency data.
